doc.field: Horsford [Farlow], Mary Leila (Lilian): England; [In Transit / At Sea]; Massachusetts; New Jersey; New York
Horsford [Farlow], Mary Leila (Lilian): England; [In Transit / At Sea]; Massachusetts; New Jersey; New York

13 Letters, 7 Envelopes, 2 Photographs, 1 United States Postal Card with Postage
Addressed To: "My dear Papa," "Professor E.N. [Eben Norton] Horsford, Lenox, MA," "Ocean House, Newport, RI," "Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island, NY"
Sent From: "Lilian [Mary Leila] Horsford [Farlow], 5 North 22nd, Orange, NJ," "Aboard the Catalonia," [In Transit / At Sea], "Cambridge," [MA], "Lenox, MA," "R.H. Stearns & Company, 139-140 Tremont Street, Boston, MA," "Salisbury," [England], "Sylvester Manor," [Shelter Island, NY], "The Grosvenor Hotel, Victoria Station, Belgravia, London SW, Telephone No. 3113," [England], "Ventnor," [England], "West Point," [NY], [Daughter of Eben Norton Horsford]
In Reference To: Family / Friendship / Personal / Social / Travel; 2 B&W Photographic Prints of Architectural Exteriors
81 Pages, Bound & Unbound
Printed & Handwritten in Ink & Pencil
Measurements: 5" x 2.75" - 5" x 8"
Horsford [Farlow], Mary Leila (Lilian): England; [In Transit / At Sea]; Massachusetts; New Jersey; New York : 1870 December 2; 1886 July 4 - 1891 September 13; undated, circa 1880s
